Pumpskin::

"Heeheeheh, there you are!" Pumpskin croons as he gathers up the 
snake-bot in his arms.  "You just relax, and Daddy will get you fixed 
up all brand-new, hehehee ..."

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, foxmanroar1@a... wrote:
> NightViper:
> 
> NightViper was almost uncontious, His head lolled back one side of 
his fave 
> was smashed in and was  bleeding energon, he continued to try and 
get his 
> systems functioning even though one eye was lying back in the other 
feild. He 
> screeched as his chest burst with an electric explosion, missile 
shrapnel was 
> mixed in with his robotic organs, his snake skin was lying around 
him in 
> shards. He knew better then to try and transform, but the nano 
system would 
> no begin if he didn't... "N-n-n-nightV-v-I-perrrrr Terrrrrorize!" 
He screamed 
> as hi changed... what lay against the tree was what some would 
describe as a 
> "roadkill" The hood was gone shredded the snake face was skeletal 
down one 
> side its eyes were blinded. The body itself was skinless, and 
almost zombie 
> like. "Eeeeeraghhh!" He coiled himself into a knot and hugged 
against the 
> tree as his entire body began sparking... Through the pain all he 
could think 
> about was StarStorm, He let his snake tongue flick out and he went 
towrads 
> the direction she last headed, but as soon as he began to slither 
another 
> pulse of electricity went though him and his body went into stasis 
lock. 
> "Ssstarssstorm....." He blacked out and lay silent.
